record.content:
Hello, I'm Nuve

A perfectly crafted theme
to create Awesome One page website.

Portfolio

Use masonry to build grid portfolio
from blog or work.

The masonry page-list template let you
to create awesome portfolio or blog.
Manage number of columns, margins or not.
Support sorting with tags and searching with key word !

Unbelievable to put your work on the top

record.title: Full page background
record.paragraph: Choose a color or a image from file-manager to use as section background

record.title: Google fonts
record.paragraph: Nuve support Google fonts, Choose from numerous theme preset to fit with your need.

record.title: Material Design Lite
record.paragraph: Nuve is using The awesome Google Material Lite as UI design. Add buttons, tables, ..

record.title: HTML5 & Bootstrap 3
record.paragraph: The scaffolding of the theme is pretty strong and modern.

record.title: Pretty responsive
record.paragraph: Nuve is pretty responsive. The scroll effect is disabled on small screen where it is not useful.

record.title: Page list tags sorting
record.paragraph: Nuve display you work is a beautiful way, as your work, with tags sorting and Keyword searching.

record.title: Scroll transitions
record.paragraph: Incredible effect on scroll let your user live a great experience.

record.content:
Make Nuve, YOURS !

Nuve is completely customizable, you get all the power at your fingers.
Customize colors, backgrounds, Set the number of sections (slides), the scroll effect, activate the auto-scroll position, the number of columns in the page-list template, ..

Buy Nuve
